items.text: full on off, opens the face for a drill through point
items.shortText: Thomas to Mushfiqur Rahim, 2 runs

items.text: short of a length, angled in, tucked behind square leg
items.shortText: Roach to Tamim Iqbal, 2 runs

items.text: good length on middle and off, defended
items.shortText: Roach to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: full, swinging away outside off, pushed out to cover
items.shortText: Roach to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: short of a length, punched through backward point
items.shortText: Roach to Tamim Iqbal, 2 runs

items.text: back of a length, angled in, tucked off the hips to midwicket
items.shortText: Roach to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: short of a length, outside off, gets an outside edge towards third man. And he's overstepped again
items.shortText: Roach to Mushfiqur Rahim, (no ball) 1 run

items.text: sends down a full toss on the free-hit delivery and it's clubbed over cow corner
items.shortText: Roach to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

items.text: good length around off, blocked
items.shortText: Thomas to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: full, angled in, clipped to deep fine leg
items.shortText: Thomas to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: full, angled in, clipped away to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Thomas to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

items.text: short of a length, defended
items.shortText: Thomas to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: short, angled in, goes over leg stump
items.shortText: Thomas to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: full, leans into a drive to extra cover
items.shortText: Thomas to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: short of length, angled in from wide of the crease, and beats the outside edge
items.shortText: Roach to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: short of length, nips away, shuffles across and keeps it out
items.shortText: Roach to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: fires it in from wide of the crease but he's sure of his off-stump and lets it go
items.shortText: Roach to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: back of a length, defended from the crease
items.shortText: Roach to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: length ball, angled in, turned away behind square leg
items.shortText: Roach to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: tucked to midwicket
items.shortText: Roach to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: short of good length, angled in, whipped off the hips to deep backward square
items.shortText: Thomas to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

items.text: short of a length, shuffles across and knocks it to deep backward point
items.shortText: Thomas to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: short outside off, fails to get on top of it and misses as he slaps at it
items.shortText: Thomas to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: short of a length, walks across and tries to pull but finds short fine
items.shortText: Thomas to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: gets on top of the bounce and blocks
items.shortText: Thomas to Tamim Iqbal, no run
